text.div:
BC MitoticCountScore Logical Model

How fast the tumor cells are growing and dividing, determined from the number of mitotic cells present. Scored 1 to 3, with 3 being the most mitotic cells.

name: MitoticCountScore
title: BC MitoticCountScore Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: How fast the tumor cells are growing and dividing, determined from the number of mitotic cells present. Scored 1 to 3, with 3 being the most mitotic cells.
